mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM ht_borrow_tender WHERE loan_order_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( #{startDate} ), '%Y%m%d' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( #{endDate} ), '%Y%m%d' ) UNION SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM ht_credit_tender WHERE create_time >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND create_time <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') UNION SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_tender WHERE create_time >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and create_time <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
